metadata.title: CVE-2024-27766 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in MariaDB v.11.1 allows a remote attacker to execute arbitrarycode via the lib_mysqludf_sys.so function. NOTE: this is disputed by theMariaDB Foundation because no privilege boundary is crossed.

criterions.comment: mysql-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'see notes').
